law.text:
As used in this chapter:
"Local government" means any city, county, urban-county government, consolidated local government, charter county government, or unified local government of the Commonwealth; and
"Writing" or "written" means letters, words, or numbers, or their equivalent, set down by handwriting, typewriting, printing, photostating, photographing, magnetic impulse, mechanical or electronic recording, or other form of data compilation.
law.history: Amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 88, sec. 1, effective June 25, 2013. -- Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 120, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1998.
